content: it's cool I mean I really like the magic horses in the cards and everything but I was hoping it was actually the game for that so yeah I mean it was kind of a bummer that it wasn't just that but the game itself was hoping that they would put it back online but they never did so I was either hoping that or I bought the DS game and I don't know how to like play some of it for the races and the other stuff that I can't unlock for the missions so I was kind of hoping I could play online again
Rating for the potential here. Not a lot to do on the app except claiming a daily card, but again it has a lot of potential. Can't wait to see how they update this game app over time.
Sad, don't waste your money. It isn't what it used to be at all!

VERY DISAPPOINTED!!! I used to play this game as a kid and looked forward to sharing it with my little sister...this app is a joke, no games, no horse care (the best part!). You literally just get to click a button everyday to get a random card. You can't do anything. Don't waste your money hoping for the old experience. The magic is gone.
Its ok but you guys have really big horseshoes to fill also im not getting any cards after a few days of using this app.
Having issues of loading cards

I've rated it 2 stars because I really want it to be good. I love Bella Sara and I see potential in an app that allows you to collect cards daily. However once I have filled the favourites, I'm just seeing the same ones every day. Bella Sara has such a huge collection of artwork and cards, yet I only have access to 55. Doesn't sound right to me. It would mean so much to me if we can collect more and create entire albums

Beautiful experience playing this game. It completely reminded me of my childhood, when I was really into collecting the cards and playing their games online. The cards are inspiring; meditative in a way. Great for children, it may possibly help them connect to their own passions and selfworth, which is very important in today's society.
What hapoend to the other game where u can take care if your horses I have lots of money in the game where you take care of the live horse lost everything
Good start so far. It would be great for the physical cards to come back and be able to scan them in. Also being able to care for the horses like the old game.

I love Bella Sara Trading Cards and I love the horses. I used to play on the website before it was taken down. I've collected all the horses and was hoping that you guys will add the rest of the bella sara trading cards series onto the app. Thank you for making this game. I love it so much.

I too am rating five stars for the potential here, I agree with many of the reviews saying there is so much you can do with this!! I don't actually know where the old content went, but I do know it was flash player based so who even knows if it can be adapted. I loved the cards more than the website anyway. Thank you for making this, a beautiful start!!!

I'm giving it two stars for now, because I just started and already don't really like it. I also wanna know. What happened to the website login? I had so many horses and cards collected on there, and now I can't even log on.

I use to play this game all the time on my moms computer. I am disappointed. Im not even sorry because this is nothing like the game i usr to play. It had horse that i could take care off. And other games. This is a dissapointment.

i'm giving 5 stars because i believe in the potential this app has, although right now it isn't really worth paying for considering all the content is available elsewhere for free. i'd love if more was added, specifically a game element and all the original cards being added, maybe even a new app exclusive card series to collect. i'm happy to support Bella Sara in any way i can and as i was never able to collect the cards when i was younger, i'm excited to now! good luck developers!
Resets itself, had 30 cards collected and favourite and now it's back to 0... Awesome
not the same anymore

To the creator/s of this app. PLEASE if you are going to take people's money then give them more exclusive content. Everything on this app is found for free on the internet. I believe this could be such a beautiful app but you need to put more work into it. I'm holding onto it with hopes it will be updated in the future.

If I could give less than 1 star I would. This app is absolutely horrible it's not even worth the money to get it the original website is so much better this app is completely pointless. Good thing is it gives you the option to get your refund so there's that at least. this also means all the money we spent buying cards and collecting them and even new ones that we've collected are useless because we can't even enter the codes.

Disappointing. It's nothing like the original Bella Sara game. There are no games other than drawing one card a day, has 3 songs you can play, and a link to Emma's wings, which you can watch on YouTube. Im really disappointed. It does not recapture the orginal magic bella sara had.

This was not worth the money... I'm disappointed. The old website was much better. Uploading your own cards and getting to play with each unique and beautiful horse was far more intertaining and well worth paying for. If those options ever get added back on the website and in the app I will gladly repuchase the app but until then I would definitely like my refund.
Horrible, lame stupid; you got rid of the original website so now you cant play with the horses. You've ruined every girls dream. I've worked so hard on my account!

I'm all for a Bella Sara app, I just wish it had more to do. As much as I want to support Bella Sara and keep it alive, there's so little to do on here that I can't spend my money on this in good concious. Make it original! Maybe add some games that give you currency you can buy cards with. Add every set/series, so you can work your way to collecting them all. I'd happily pay for that. I don't want this app to fail, so please, make some changes! In the meantime I'll support however I can.

Disappointing Paid $4,74 for this game only to draw one yes I mean just ONE card and play music I guess üôÅüôÅ not happy that some of my earnt money went to something that should be free.. The loading screen could be better too... Looks boring as hell with just a app logo on it.. if you are gonna make people pay for a useless app make it more exciting than an average app

I absolutely love this app! I remember as a child whenever I was scared or confused I would sit down and read the quotes on these cards. They gave me such confidence and always made me feel better. My favorite quote was from Thunder, "I give you courage. Now you can release your fears." I'm so happy I now can have these on my phone and I can look at them anywhere and anytime. I'm so excited to collect them all.
